Package de.gnwi.jdpd.samples.harmonicBonds

Class HarmonicBondPropertyCalculator

java.lang.Object
de.gnwi.jdpd.samples.harmonicBonds.HarmonicBondPropertyCalculator
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICalculator, IHarmonicBondPropertyCalculator
Direct Known Subclasses:
HarmonicBondForceConservativeCalculator, HarmonicBondPotentialCalculator
public abstract class HarmonicBondPropertyCalculator extends Object implements IHarmonicBondPropertyCalculator
Harmonic bond property calculator for parallelised calculation of bond chunk properties. The bond chunk parallelisation implementation allows the use of fast NON thread-safe objects and accumulation items like non thread-safe double adders and standard (NON atomic) double arrays.
Author:
Achim Zielesny

      public boolean calculateBondProperties(LinkedList<HarmonicBondChunkArrays> aBondChunkArraysList, double[] aR_x, double[] aR_y, double[] aR_z, Parameters aParameters)
      Calculates bond properties. (No checks are performed)
      Specified by:
      calculateBondProperties in interface IHarmonicBondPropertyCalculator
      Parameters:
      aBondChunkArraysList - List of bond chunk arrays
      aR_x - Current x-components of particle positions in simulation box
      aR_y - Current y-components of particle positions in simulation box
      aR_z - Current z-components of particle positions in simulation box
      aParameters - Parameters (may be null)
      Returns:
      True: Operation successful, false: Otherwise

    • calculateBondProperty

      protected abstract void calculateBondProperty(int aParticleIndex_i, int aParticleIndex_j, double aRij_x, double aRij_y, double aRij_z, double aBondLength, double aForceConstant, HarmonicBond.HarmonicBondBehaviour aHarmonicBondBehaviour, AdderGroup anAdderGroup, Parameters aParameters)
      Abstract method for bond property calculation NOTE: HarmonicBondPropertyCalculator parallelisation guarantees for aDoubleAdder being unique in current working thread thus NO thread-safe implementation of double adder is necessary.
      Parameters:
      aParticleIndex_i - Index of particle i
      aParticleIndex_j - Index of particle j
      aRij_x - x[aParticleIndex_i] - x[aParticleIndex_j]
      aRij_y - y[aParticleIndex_i] - y[aParticleIndex_j]
      aRij_z - z[aParticleIndex_i] - z[aParticleIndex_j]
      aBondLength - Bond length
      aForceConstant - Force constant
      aHarmonicBondBehaviour - Behaviour of harmonic bond
      anAdderGroup - Adder group (NOTE: NOT thread-safe)
      aParameters - Parameters (may be null)
